mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AUTHOR ORDER BY AUTHOR_SEQ DESC
SELECT * FROM AUTHOR WHERE AUTHOR_KR_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY AUTHOR_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTHOR ( AUTHOR_KR_NAME, AUTHOR_CH_NAME, AUTHOR_EN_NAME, AUTHOR_CONTENT, AUTHOR_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, AUTHOR_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_FILE_NAME, APPEND_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{authorKrName}, #{authorChName}, #{authorEnName}, #{authorContent}, #{authorThumbnailImage}, #{authorThumbnailImageFileName}, NOW(), NOW(), #{useYn} )
mapper.update: UPDATE AUTHOR SET AUTHOR_KR_NAME = #{authorKrName}, AUTHOR_CH_NAME = #{authorChName}, AUTHOR_EN_NAME = #{authorEnName}, AUTHOR_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE = #{authorThumbnailImage}, AUTHOR_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_FILE_NAME = #{authorThumbnailImageFileName}, AUTHOR_CONTENT = #{authorContent}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, UPDATE_DATE = NOW() WHERE AUTHOR_SEQ = #{authorSeq}
